sentences.sContent: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.sContent_eng: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.sCn: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

trans.tranCn: [林] 柳树；[木] 柳木制品
trans.tranOther: a type of tree that has long thin branches and grows near water, or the wood from this tree
